products.title: Hive Blackout Berry Perfect Fit
products.description: Hive blackoutberry perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their hive blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, upvc windows and doors. The "hiveblackout" range has a backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.

products.title: Perfect Fit Hive Blackout Berry Duo Thermal Blind
products.description: Use hive blackout when you need extra light control in addition to the thermal insulation qualities hive offers. products.title: Bella Blackout Scarlet Red Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling bella blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This bright bold red perfect fit roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure perfect fit blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.
